record.name: PBM Change Category to go to Categorization phase

rule.conditionDesc: ( category in CurrentRecord != category in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Problem Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Problem Category">category</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status via JavaScript (when ( category in CurrentRecord != category in SavedRecord))
